actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to provide for automatic adjustment of deduction to individual retirement accounts, and so forth, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for an automatic cost of living adjustment to the maximum dollar amount of the income tax deduction for retirement savings contributions to individual retirement accounts (IRA's).

titles.title: A bill to provide for automatic adjustment of deduction to individual retirement accounts, and so forth, and for other purposes.
